stimulusHtml: The total cost, in dollars, to order x units of a certain product is modeled by C(x)=5x2+320. According to the model, for what size order is the cost per unit a minimum?
choicesHtml: An order of 1 unit has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 8 units has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 80 units has a minimum cost per unit.
An order of 320 units has a minimum cost per unit.
